item.title: HC-GAE: The Hierarchical Cluster-based Graph Auto-Encoder for Graph Representation Learning
item.description: HC-GAE: A novel hierarchical graph autoencoder combats over-smoothing by using hard node assignment to create isolated subgraphs, improving graph representation learning for classification.
